Posts.Content: I took Tomexifen for 8 years with no side effects at all. I also have two friemds who took it for 5 and 6 years with no side effects. What ever you decide, do not just sit and wait. You have to be pro active. My cancer was in 1987. --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ----
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen Treatment

Posts.Content: I had my left breast removed 17 years ago. My Dr gave me Tomixflin and I went to see him every three months. The six months and finally twice a year for five years. I had a scan before each visit. I think you should get your medical records and go to another oncoligest, or Cancer Treatment center. Something is out of kilter here. Do not just stand by and say OK. Dr's are not all knowing Gods, Mildred
Posts.Title: Follow up Care After Last Treatment
